mapper.select: SELECT MAX(sale_id)+1 as id from VIP_SALE
SELECT wc.CLIENT_NAME, wc.CLIENT_MOBILE ,* FROM ${tableName} tb LEFT JOIN WEB_CLIENT wc ON tb.CLIENT_ID = wc.CLIENT_ID WHERE tb.city_id = #{cityId} AND tb.${fieldId} = #{vipId}
select build_Region, section_Id, info_Source, repeat_Flag, soso_Id, ugc_id, client_Id, period, TRADE_PRICE, WX_ID from ${tableName} where ${fieldName} = #{caseId} and city_Id = #{cityId}
mapper.update: update ${tableName} set PURCHASE_COUNT = ISNULL(PURCHASE_COUNT,0)+1 where CITY_ID = #{cityId} and ${fieldName}=#{caseId}
